trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The green gleaner seems to want a word with you.
TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_GLEANER04186_000_000<tab>Excuse me, but aren't you the one who was assisting Erenville? If you have a moment, I could also use some help with a certain task...

TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_GLEANER04186_000_002<tab>Simply put, I'm to hunt down a number of caribou. But as this is the first job I've accepted which requires any degree of violence, I'm not entirely confident in how I should approach my prey.

TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_GLEANER04186_000_003<tab>You seem like the type of <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> who's seen <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> fair share of combat─what if I could observe you from concealment while you engage my target fauna!?

TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_GLEANER04186_000_005<tab>I wouldn't need you to spend all day on it, of course─one or two examples in the forest west of here should be plenty! Let's say two, shall we? I'll even pay you! ...Please?
TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_GLEANER04186_000_006<tab>The caribou shouldn't give you too much trouble. And if they do, well...that will also teach me a valuable lesson!
TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_GLEANER04186_000_010<tab>Thank you for the instruction! While I doubt I could emulate your particular style, seeing you in action was enormously helpful.

TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_GLEANER04186_000_011<tab>You've also provided a service by culling a few of Labyrinthos's more prolific animals. Lest you worry, it's essential we reduce the caribou's numbers every now and again to maintain a stable habitat.

TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_GLEANER04186_000_012<tab>And nothing here is killed for mere sport. Every part of a carcass is harvested and put to use─a practice I will make sure to carry out with the creatures you slew.

TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_GLEANER04186_000_013<tab>There are still a few more that need culling, but I think I can handle that on my own now. Such is the gleaner's lot, and I should learn how to do it sooner rather than later.
TEXT_AKTKZA007_04186_GLEANER04186_000_014<tab>Oh, and here's your payment. Wish me luck!
